name: Sewer Rats
blurb: Sewer Rats is a 3D single player action adventure game with dungeon based boss battles and an in-depth story campaign.

rewards.reward: THE RUBBER HOSE - Every drop counts! Get your credits in the game (any name you like ;). And a personal thank you straight from the sewers!
EARLY BIRD CATCHES RATS! - This is the 10$ reward tier for early backers of Sewer Rats! Get the full release of Sewer Rats! and thanks for your early support!
THE CARTOON GLOVE - DRM-free downloadable copy of the full game. Early access for kickstarter backers before full release.

THE PIE EYES - BETA and FORUM ACCESS. Play the game early and as often as you like, then send your comments and discuss what you like and what makes your eyes splode out your noggin! Plus a full length (PDF) comic involving character back-story (further to what is explained in game). Find out exciting orphan lineage! DRM-free downloadable copy of the full game before full release!

THE MAD HATTER - DRM-free downloadable copy of the full game. Plus Backer only mini-hats. A set of stylish tradesman hats for customizing your character. There will be many ways for you to customize your character, but only backers at this level and above get this mini-hat set. In addition you also receive the PDF comic above.

ANY RAGS? - Development Art Book-  sketches, screenshots, early animations, character concepts, boss concepts and level designs. All working assets from initial sketch to final renderings packaged into an organized timeline for to you see how and when it came together. Received by you in a downloadable PDF. Previous rewards from THE RUBBER HOSE and prior are also yours!

THE KLEZMER CACOPHONY - Full music soundtrack bundle. Klezmer and Gypsy music composed by chiptune artists! Also all handcrafted bleeps and bloops from the composers desk for you to use! Previous rewards from THE RUBBER HOSE and prior are also yours!

A CLEAN SHAVE - Receive both the full music soundtrack package and the entire development art book PDF. Both options and every previous tier for you to enjoy! Plus one extra full game download or activation key. (2 total)

MAN OF THE MOUNTAIN - Hand made scarf with character designs knitted onto the scarf. You receive all previous digital rewards including 3 full downloads of the game or activation keys. Scarfs are not available outside this reward.

CRAZY TOWN - Physical Box and Instruction Manual for the game! Includes Physical box, printed manual, digital copy of the game, digital download of the soundtrack package and every prior digital reward. Includes 3 full downloads of the game or activation keys. Physical box copy not available outside this reward.

THE NOTORIOUS DOPPELGANGER - Story Playable Characters. A selection of story characters in the game will be available for you to play in the game as your main character. The game has a full story with many interesting and contrasting character types to talk to. With this bundle you will be able to play as a selection of the most notorious of these characters! Includes 3 full downloads and all previous digital rewards.

UNDER FOOT - Have your name engraved on a sewer manhole cover. But dont find it in-game just for self-admiration, oh no! Find your manhole, pick up the cover and beat minions to death, not just in your name, but with it! All previous digital rewards are also yours including THE NOTORIOUS DOPPELGANGER.

SCRIBBLY BOOK - Printed back-story and origin comic book. A companion printed comic book that gives more in depth back story to the characters and boss creatures beyond what is found in-game. Includes all previous digital rewards and 3 downloadable copies of the game. PRINTED comic not available in any other reward tier.

TROPHY ROOM - Numbered, Signed and hand painted 3D print of a playable character. This character is set on a Manhole cover base and stands approx. 4" tall. The gypsy born is in a running pose with bludgeoning weapon. This will be shipped to you and signed along with a hand written note. All digital rewards are also yours along with 3 downloadable copies of the game or activation keys (3 total).

HOOTCH DISTILLERY - Help design a townsfolk character, their back story and dialogue. Help design his animations, behaviors and his personality alignment. All digital rewards and 3 downloadable copies of the game included!
